title: SET_WATER_QUAD_BOUNDS
content:
0x80AD144C// SetWaterQuadBounds
BOOL SET_WATER_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waterQuad, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY);Parameters:waterQuad: The water quad indexminX: The minX coordinateminY: The minY coordinatemaxX: The maxX coordinatemaxY: The maxY coordinateReturns: Returns true on success.This native allows you to update the bounds of a specified water quad index.Examples:Lualocal success = SetWaterQuadBounds(0, -5000.0, -5000.0, 5000.0, 5000.0)
codeBlocks:
// SetWaterQuadBounds
BOOL SET_WATER_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waterQuad, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY);
